body_html: @jekbradbury I don't think so. The dependencies go the other way around - SymbolicVariable is something that just makes building graphs easier (in particular in autodiff.cpp), not something that actually knows how to differentiate itself. It should probably be called SymbolicTensor 😄
body_text: @jekbradbury I don't think so. The dependencies go the other way around - SymbolicVariable is something that just makes building graphs easier (in particular in autodiff.cpp), not something that actually knows how to differentiate itself. It should probably be called SymbolicTensor 😄
body: @jekbradbury I don't think so. The dependencies go the other way around - `SymbolicVariable` is something that just makes building graphs easier (in particular in `autodiff.cpp`), not something that actually knows how to differentiate itself. It should probably be called `SymbolicTensor` 😄
